favourite.article: Finally some children songs to focus on humanity and not on preaching the gospel to five-year-olds. Thank you!

Thank You, Lord Jesus, for this simple, long, comprehensive song. We allowed it to take as much time as it could this morning. We said it. Then we practiced the bodily motions that go with it. Then we sang it. It is a wonderful time saver, and I thoroughly enjoy the various languages. It brings joy.
Nice rhythm. Easy to teach. Hallellujah! Amen.
This song has a nice rhythm. :D
I love the music. It's very nice... Blessings to you all.
